package.name: intell_customers
package.summary: This extension will redirect customers to your desired url.
package.description: This extension allows you to set redirection URL for customers after login. You can persistently set the URL by selecting “Always Redirect” to “Yes”. If set to “No”, customers will be redirected to set URL if it is direct login, else the redirection will function normally e.g if customer is on Checkout page and clicks on Login, he will stay on Checkout page if “Always Redirect” is “No”. If this option is set to “Yes”, the user will be redirected to set page from Checkout page.
